name: AddEmailToGithubAccount
description:
Add a new email to the authenticated GitHub user's account.

Use this tool to add an email address to the authenticated GitHub account of the user. This action requires user scope authentication.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: The email address to add to the authenticated GitHub account. Must be a valid email format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
